title: Pio Chirinos
text: Pio Chirinos (born 17 July 1929) is a Venezuelan <a href="amateur%20wrestling">wrestler</a>. He competed in the <a href="Wrestling%20at%20the%201952%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20freestyle%20middleweight">men's freestyle middleweight</a> at the <a href="1952%20Summer%20Olympics">1952 Summer Olympics</a>.
